projects.title: DATA-STRATEGY Landing Page
projects.description: I developed this landing page for the company DATA-STRATEGY, which is in its early stages.

projects.title: Xplo01t CL - Chrisvd9 Portfolio
projects.description: I developed and designed my own portfolio, addressing both user experience (UX) and user interface (UI).

projects.title: Lizilib
projects.description: I was responsible for the frontend development and design of Lizilib, a platform that simplifies the bidding process and provides AI assistance through a chatbot. Using web scraping on the backend, I visualized the data through information cards and connected the chatbot. Lizilib has various functionalities that facilitate the bidding process with the government.

projects.title: GrowCloud Landing Page
projects.description: I developed and designed the landing page for GrowCloud, addressing both user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design. I developed the page in React, leveraging Vite's capabilities for efficient development and optimized project building, and styled it with Tailwind CSS and Custom CSS. I used gsap and aos for animations.

projects.title: Lizilib Landing Page
projects.description: I developed and designed the landing page for Lizilib from Growcloud, addressing both user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design. I developed the page in React, leveraging Vite's capabilities for efficient development and optimized project building, and styled it with Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: Educational Landing Page
projects.description: I developed and designed this landing page for educational purposes, addressing both user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design. I developed the page in React, leveraging Vite's capabilities for efficient development and optimized project building, and styled it with DaisyUI, Custom CSS, and used Framer motion for animations.

projects.title: Gmail UI Clone
projects.description: I created a visual clone of the Gmail interface with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Note that this version does not include interactive features.

projects.title: Short Jokes AI Generator
projects.description: Short joke generator made with NextJS, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and the OpenAI API.
